entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Greenwood
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:38 AM AST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -0.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Greenwood 04:47 AM AST Friday 20 January 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -0.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 86 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -2.9°C
Wind: ENE 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this morning. Blowing snow over exposed areas this afternoon. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning then northeast 30 gusting to 50 this afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending before morning then cloudy. Blowing snow over exposed areas this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming north 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly cloudy. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 20 January 2023
